title: 09/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin dives in on Jon Gruden's lack of success he's had since returning to the NFL and what has led to his downfall throughout his career. He completely disagrees with Tony Romo claiming Jets rookie QB Zach Wilson will be a top 3 player in a few years. He also believes Aaron Rodgers will be a repeat MVP contender to start the season but points out where it could all unravel. Plus, Fox Sports College Football Analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to tell Colin which national powerhouse will contend for a championship this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
